name: dotnetty
description: Guidance for DotNetty event-driven asynchronous network application framework. USE FOR: high-performance TCP/UDP servers and clients, custom binary protocol implementations, Netty-style channel pipelines, event loop groups, codec handlers, TLS/SSL socket connections. DO NOT USE FOR: HTTP APIs (use ASP.NET Core), gRPC services (use grpc-dotnet), email sending (use mimekit), high-level stream processing (use system-io-pipelines).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
